meanings.definition: To join or attach with glue.
meanings.sent1: She is gluing the pieces of paper together.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy gluing colorful beads onto my artwork.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried gluing its toy mouse to the floor, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: His words were like gluing broken hearts back together.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gluing the puzzle pieces echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: The act of using glue to join or attach objects together.
meanings.sent2: I ran out of gluing for my craft project.
meanings.sent3: The gluing on the art project made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gluing things together was evident in her room full of crafts.
meanings.sent5: The smell of gluing filled the classroom during art class.
